'''Mythcon 12''' was the twelfth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "A Festival in Faerie"
*'''Guest of Honors:''' Elizabeth M. Pope (fantasy author and scholar) and Joe R. Christopher (Lewis scholar and Inklings bibliographer)
*'''Chairman:''' Diana L. Paxson
